value.title: StarCraft 2: Scarlett's GOLDEN Swarm Hosts!
value.excerpt: Awesome game of Zerg versus Protoss between Scarlett and Nina in StarCraft 2. This particular game is far different from what we normally see at the pro level in this matchup. A wide variety of units is used, with only a minor focus on the Stargate units and Corruptors.  Support my work on Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/lowkotv

value.title: StarCraft 2: uThermal's SUPER SLOW Terran Push!
value.excerpt: Stargazers managed to take fourth place at the most recent StarCraft 2 Map Contest (TLMC 16). There's a good chance that this map will be used in future SC2 tournaments. value.title: StarCraft 2: Very STRANGE Terran Strategies! (Serral vs GuMiho)
value.excerpt: A fun best-of-3 series of professional StarCraft 2 between Serral (Zerg) and GuMiho (Terran). At this point I am fairly certain that GuMiho plays a different strategy in every game he plays. In this best-of-3 series he decides to play Mech, cheesy Marines and a very strange Bio based opener.   Vanya
